page.title: 05LEISURE FOR PUPILS-N.W.NCLE.
page.content: In our area there are a large number of recreational facilities including {sports grounds}and large public {playing fields.}There are also{clubs for sports such as squash,golf,bowls and boxing.For younger children there are{adventure playgrounds}and several open spaces have{climbing frames}or swings.From a survey of 54 children it was clear that the majority spent their leisure hours in{unorganised {activities,}the most popular being football,tennis,swimming,jogging and B.M.X.riding.For the few who used facilities like swimming pools,sports halls and ice-rinks,they had to{travel {outside the area.}However,pupils can travel on buses and the Metro for only 5p.Only 25% attended{Youth Clubs.}At these,discos,breakdancing and gymnastics were popular.Very few pupils attended Scouts or Guides.
